documents.document: On the way to my heart I wrote "Entering forbidden", but Love came in laughing and said "I enter wherever I want".

I lost because I trusted. I trusted because I believed; in all those Lies you told me... I loved and you deceived.
I want you to know that you're beautiful in everything you say & everything you do. And no matter how you turn out, I'll always love you .
Haters don't really hate you, they hate themselves; because you're a reflection of what they wish to be.

It's better to be absolutely ridiculous than to be absolutely boring.
When you're lonely always remember that theres someone out there loving you more than words can explain&smile just knowing that person is me
